attachments.text: Â  The Tobii software and drivers do currently not support Mac, OSX or iOS. Running Windows emulated under Boot Camp orÂ Parallel is unsupported but we've had reports from users getting it to work. W...

text:
<https://github.com/tobiitech/stream-engine-docs>
> Tobii Stream Engine supports all major desktop operating systems Windows(x86 and x64), Linux(x64) and macOS(x64).
<https://developer.tobii.com/consumer-eye-trackers/stream-engine/getting-started/>
> Our gaming eye tracker, Tobii Eye Tracker 4C, only supports Windows. Software development kits for the 4C are only available for Windows.

<https://developer.tobii.com/community/forums/topic/linux-and-mac-sdk/page/2/#post-14212>
> Hi Gabriele, I am afraid that we no longer support or provide SDK bindings to use the 4C in conjunction with a Mac. Apologies for any inconvenience.
2020/05/01 ã®çŠ¶æ³ãŒæœ€æ–°ã€‚é–‹ç™ºç”¨ã®4Lã‚‚Macã¯éå¯¾å¿œã«ãªã£ãŸã‚“ã‹ãª?
